price: Ва ҳеҷ касро ба қасди подош ёфтани неъмат намебахшад
arabic: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعۡمَةٖ تُجۡزَىٰٓ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamā li-aḥadin ʿindahu min niʿ'matin tuj'zā
